bibl.title: Dispatch from Henry May to William Walker, January 21, 1862
Despatches from United States Consuls in Gaboon, 1856-1888 T-466

text.body:
<pb facs="20170615_110412"
United States Commercial Agency at Gaboon Reier
This may certify that Henry May book possession of the property belonging to the United States at this place and upon the discharge of his duties nas Comml. Agent upon the 3rd of Memebers M.G.L. and that upon that day the of Ronbillion? so BriaComml. Agent terminated
The property belonging to the United States as debreth to Henry May by Ro. Mellhom of one flag, one person and seal five Conseluar accounts of United States *** at large and , Relations elements of international for one of Commercial relations and the need one half reams of paper. Unites our hands on the day and open above
Henry May
W.Walker
